Configuration.Name: Primo VE Chromium
Configuration.Author: Bill Jones, Tamara Marnell
Configuration.Description: Performs an Title, ISBN, ISSN, and OCLC Number Search in the Primo VE interface.

Setting.name: GoToLandingPage
Setting.Description: Defines whether you would like the Addon to go directly to the PrimoURL start page set in your config (true or false).

Setting.name: AutoSearchISxN
Setting.Description: Defines whether the ISxN search should be automatically performed when the form opens (true or false).

Setting.name: AutoSearchTitle
Setting.Description: Defines whether the Title search should be automatically performed when the form opens (true or false).

Setting.name: BaseURL
Setting.Description: Defines the base of your Primo URL. See the ReadMe for an example.

Setting.name: DatabaseName
Setting.Description: Defines the Database Name of your Primo URL. See the ReadMe for an example.

Setting.name: SearchTab
Setting.Description: Defines the tab to search. See the ReadMe for an example.

Setting.name: SearchScope
Setting.Description: Defines the scope to search. See the ReadMe for an example.

Setting.name: MaterialTypePhrase
Setting.Description: IMPORTANT! This value must be filled in for the Addon to work. Please enter the label used in the 'Item in Place' box for Format, Format Type, or Material Type.

Setting.name: BarcodeLocation
Setting.Description: Defines which field to use in ILLiad to inserting the Barcode (example: ItemInfo5). This setting must contain a value in order to gather the Barcode.

Setting.name: Include_Main_Location_Name
Setting.Description: Determines whether or not to prepend the Main Locaion to the SubLocation when writing the Location value to an ILLiad field.
